chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap (I m x t p) -> genus (I m x t p) = genus m

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
genus = fun m : fmap => nc m - ec m / 2 : fmap -> Z
point = (R * R)%type : Set
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
tag = nat : Set
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
planar_I : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_I m x -> planar (I m x t p)
incr_genus_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> genus m <= genus (L m one x y)
incr_genus_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> genus m <= genus (L m zero x y)
incr_genus : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> genus m <= genus (L m k x y)
fmap_rect : forall P : fmap -> Type, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
fmap_rec : forall P : fmap -> Set, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
fmap_ind : forall P : fmap -> Prop, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
genus_corollary : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> genus m >= 0
MA1.period_expo : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA1.expo m z t -> MA1.Iter_upb m z = MA1.Iter_upb m t
MF.expo_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m z t -> MF.degree m z = MF.degree m t
MF.period_expo : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m z t -> MF.Iter_upb m z = MF.Iter_upb m t
MA1.expo_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA1.expo m z t -> MA1.degree m z = MA1.degree m t
MA1.L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MA1.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MA1.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (MA1.Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
MF.L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MF.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MF.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (MF.Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
MA1.L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MA1.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MA1.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
MF.L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MF.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MF.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
MF.expo_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m z t -> exd m t
MA1.expo_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA1.expo m z t -> exd m t
planar = fun m : fmap => genus m = 0 : fmap -> Prop
MF.Iter_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i n : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MF.f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (MF.f m) i z
MF.Iter_plus_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MF.f m) p z = z -> Iter (MF.f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (MF.f m) i z
fast_Zplus_assoc : forall (n m p : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (n + m + p) -> P (n + (m + p))
fast_Zplus_assoc_reverse : forall (n m p : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (n + (m + p)) -> P (n + m + p)
bottom_bottom_top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = top m k y
MA1.ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := MA1.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := MA1.Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA1.f m) i z = t}
MF.ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := MF.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := MF.Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MF.f m) i z = t}
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
succ_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x
expf_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m x y -> eqc m x y
eqc_cA_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x (cA m k y) -> eqc m x y
